edu.uoc.som.jarvis.plugins.core.platform

Class CorePlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uoc.som.jarvis.core.platform.RuntimePlatform
      • edu.uoc.som.jarvis.plugins.core.platform.CorePlatform

  • public class CorePlatform
extends RuntimePlatform
    A RuntimePlatform concrete implementation providing core functionality that can be used in execution models.

    This runtimePlatform defines a set of high level RuntimeActions:

    • GetTime: return the current time
    • GetDate: return the current date

    This class is part of jarvis' core platforms, and can be used in an execution model by importing the CorePlatform package.

    See Also:
    GetTime, GetDate
